Source.Name: abcm2ps
Source.Summary: abcm2ps is a command line program which converts ABC to music sheet
Source.Description: abcm2ps is a command line program which converts ABC to music sheet in PostScript or SVG format. It is an extension of abc2ps which may handle many voices per staff

Package.Name: abcm2ps
Package.Summary: abcm2ps is a command line program which converts ABC to music sheet
Package.Description: abcm2ps is a command line program which converts ABC to music sheet in PostScript or SVG format. It is an extension of abc2ps which may handle many voices per staff
